Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization of the county of Onondaga to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the authorization of the county of Onondaga to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes until November 30, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization of the county of Onondaga to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes
